definition: gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Tyson had repeatedly complained about head-butting in the first bout between the two.
sentences.chinese: 第一回閤中，泰森在不斷抱怨兩人之間的頭部撞擊。

sentences.english: It was toward the end of July, equivalent to the 'san-fu' period ofthe lunar calendar - the hottest days of the year.
sentences.chinese: 這是七月下旬，閤中國舊曆的三伏，一年最熱的時候。

sentences.english: There are 10 sentences in each game,1 per round.
sentences.chinese: 在每個遊戲，每一回閤中有10個句子。

sentences.english: They are F aggregates formed by the association of F centers.
sentences.chinese: 它們是由F心的凝聚作用而形成的締閤中心。

sentences.english: If you do, Laccolith Warrior deals no combat damage this turn. The screams are brief. The silence lingers.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此作，則噴炎戰士在本回閤中不造成戰鬥傷害。

sentences.english: It is late July, a period in the third hottest-ten in traditional Chinese calendar, and hotter in China than it was.
sentences.chinese: 這是七月下旬，閤中國舊曆的三伏，一年最熱的時候。

sentences.english: He put his opponent out in the fifth round.
sentences.chinese: 他在第五回閤中將對手擊昏。

sentences.english: The boxer polished off his opponent in the first round.
sentences.chinese: 第一回閤中這名拳擊手就把對手擊敗了。

sentences.english: Growing naturally hits the happy mean.
If you do, Laccolith Titan deals no combat damage this turn. Proximity guarantees injury or death.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此作，則噴炎泰坦在本回閤中不造成戰鬥傷害。

sentences.english: They struggle more with the second half’s 3-part blind tasting.
sentences.chinese: 在第二回閤中的3部分盲品中，他們就有些艱難了。

sentences.english: If you do, Laccolith Whelp deals no combat damage this turn. They don't feed; they stoke.
sentences.chinese: 若你如此作，則噴炎幼獸在本回閤中不造成戰鬥傷害。

sentences.english: Joe knocked his opponent out in the first round of the contest.
sentences.chinese: 喬在比賽第一回閤中就把對方擊倒了。

sentences.english: In this respect, I declare this one a tie.
sentences.chinese: 考慮到這些方面，我宣佈二者在這一回閤中打成平手。

sentences.english: The Wilsons couldn't sleep a wink the first night they spent in their new house.
sentences.chinese: 威爾森家族在搬到新家的第一晚從未閤過眼。

sentences.english: A type of pump commonly used in the handling and mixing of oilfield fluids.
sentences.chinese: 在油田流體處理和拌閤中普遍使用的一種泵。

definition: Xingyang city and county in Henan
belly/skin/to state/to pass on information/to display
to tend toward/to guide/variant of 向[xiang4]
booklet/brochure/(old) book (made of bamboo strips tied together)
Jianli county in Jingzhou 荊州|荆州[Jing1 zhou1], Hubei
